content: this is a written pattern using us crochet terminology stitches and abbreviations used skip st chain bp slip_stitch increase single_crochet half_double_crochet ehdc double_crochet edc treble_crochet etr dtr fpdc fptr bphdc bpdc bptr bpdc3tog bptr4tog decrease sc3tog hdc2tog hdc3tog decrease dc3tog tr4tog this is the first 39 rounds of the 103 round galaxy of change pattern the mini can be continued into the full pattern at round 40 if you need help feel free to contact me via ravelry pm 1 in my ravelry group made of change 2 or on facebook as frank orandle 3 1 http //www ravelry com/people/frankorandle 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/made-of-change 3 https //www facebook com/frank orandle
